column5: It's been cancelled a few times & today was finally the day & man was it hot lol Tight Lines Richard    Thrive Studio
That is awesome. After you last 2 tattoo pictures you have showed us, it has finally got to me. Time to get another tattoo.
Well i hope you know ..."that aint commin off"  Nice Tat !
Awesome and emotional all in one!!!  Tight Lines to you too Richard!!!
Thanx everyone, I've had lots of great comments on it & they told me it might be permanent lol, now I need to decide if I want another? maybe my big Muskies Mouth Tight Lines SBK
